column4: does anyone know if ubuntu can be used as a thin client server
Yes, it can.
do you know where i can find documentation
check out the wiki.
I'm ready. I have the file on my xubuntu desktop.
ok now go ahead and install it
once bcm43xx-fwcutter is installed download this file http://boredklink.googlepages.com/wl_apsta.o (dont worry its real small)
sudo bcm43xx-fwcutter -w /lib/firmware ***/wl_apsta.o  *** = where ever that file is
It installed bcm43xx-firmware, not bcm43xx-fwcutter. Is that ok?
Yes.
command not found.
Where can I get fwcutter?
No need. I have wireless working.
You there? I restarted and my wireless no longer works.
modprobe bcm43xx
Can I add that to a config somewhere to get it to auto-load on startup?
It seems that my DNS resolution is taking FOREVER.
You know of any way to speed up DNS name resolution on this thing? It takes ages.
i manually added mine
My DNS server is my default gateway. I added it already.,
wep.
well i use gnome but ill look for one
sudo apt-get install network-manager network-manager-gnome  then    sudo apt-get remove network-manager-gnome
